page.title: 01Newspapers and Television
page.content:
{MEDIA SCAN IS THE NAME OF A LOCAL FREE ADVERTISING NEWSPAPER.IT COVERS PORTISHEAD,CLEVEDON,NAILSEA,WESTON-SUP ER-MARE,WORLE,GLASTONBURY,STREET,WELLS ,BURNHAM ON SEA,HIGHBRIDGE,BRIDGWATER AND TAUNTON. THE MOST POPULAR THINGS PEOPLE WANT TO SELL ARE HOUSEHOLD ITEMS. MOST PEOPLE IN PORTISHEAD FIND SCAN USEFUL AND MOST PEOPLE HAVE USED IT FOR BUYING AND SELLING THINGS. MOST PEOPLE DONT LIKE THE NAME SCAN.
{TELEVISION AND VIDEO NEARLY EVERYBODY IN THE PORTISHEAD AREA OWNS A TELEVISION AND USE IT A LOT. PEOPLE LIKE MANY DIFFERENT TELEVISION PROGRAMMES.WE WENT TO ASK MR AND MRS CROMLEY WHO HIRE OUT VIDEOS.THE FAVOURITE TYPE OF VIDEO IS AN ADVENTURE VIDEO.RAIDERS OF THE LOST ARK IS THE ALL TIME FAVOURITE.
